Notifies the view that the state has changed so it can repaint itself in order to convey the correct model.

T

takeFromAcross(Pit) - Method in class Model
This method allows us to follow the rule where if you end on one of your empty pits, you can take all the marbles in the pit opposite of that ending pit.

Returns if the last move was undone
